title: Stop making urf threads to farm upvotes

replies.body:
Prepared to get downvoted by the downvoting community.

Basically, cry about urf=get upvotes

cry about champion flavor of the week being too OP=upvotes (might want to try fizz, maybe zed)

I mean, people even downvote questions regarding gameplay. it's hilarious really. Someone asking how to go play Ekko, what role fits him best, and stuff, and he gets downvoted haha.
Then stop making these threads to farm downvotes. :3
